ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of KIM KIERANS of Halifax, Nova Scotia, as a special adviser to the Minister of National Revenue, to serve as Vice-Chairperson of the Independent Advisory Board on Eligibility for Journalism Tax Measures, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years, on a part-time basis.
